dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 11.5 x 83 cm (4 1/2 x 32 11/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 11 x 74.5 cm (4 5/16 x 29 5/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 10 x 22 cm (3 15/16 x 8 11/16 in.)
title: Chintz fragments
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, 2 reds and brown applied by pen and brush. Blue applied by brush over resist. Speckled effect made by mixing a red mordant with another substance.
Painted
description: Three strips which were originally part of a large bordered panel. Parts of medallions on a red ground.
name: Chintz fragments
